item.name: INVALID_PATH
item.comment: Path is too long, too many sym links, etc.

item.name: BUSY
item.comment: Operand is in use by the system or by a process

item.name: NO_MORE_FILES
item.comment: Directory stream has no more files

item.name: BUFFER_TOO_SMALL
item.comment: Buffer size is too small to hold full path (for getWorkingDirectory)

item.name: EXDEV_ERROR
item.comment: Operation not supported across devices (e.g. rename)

item.name: OVERFLOW_ERROR
item.comment: Operation failed due to overflow in calculation of the result

item.name: NOT_SUPPORTED
item.comment: Operation is not supported by the current implementation
